synopsis.text: Watch as the vibrant world of the Hidamari Apartments comes alive in this delightful anime! The girls who reside here are all students at the prestigious Yamabuki Art School, and while their studies keep them busy, they always find time for fun and adventure. Join Yuno, Sae, Hiro, Miyako, and newcomers Nori and Nazuna as they embark on a series of exciting escapades that range from visiting an open-air art museum, to hosting a sleepover at Hiro's place, to transforming a kiddie pool into a makeshift curtain washer. Even chores become an opportunity for creativity and laughter in the hands of these resourceful young artists. And when their landlady invites them to an all-you-can-eat grilled meat restaurant, the girls are more than ready to indulge in some well-deserved feasting. With its charming characters, beautiful animation, and heartwarming slice-of-life stories, this anime is sure to capture your heart and leave you wanting more.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
